body: Have mods completely stopped enforcing rules on the forums? Last time I checked swearing on Avicus' services wasn't allowed, yet I see it all over the forums. Can you please bring this up into a staff discussion or just edit the swearing out of posts?

replies.body:
The swearing rule needs to be reverted back to the old system.
This zero tolerance for swearing makes no sense, especially because the staff don't seem to enforce this rule.
